title: 🤑4 Weeks Free 🤑Borders Both Downtown and Eastside Hot Spots 🤑
posting_body: 🌆 Brand New Luxury Community offering 4 weeks free on 12-14 month lease terms.

🔥 Community offers 2 pools, one being on the rooftop with private cabanas, jumbo movie screen, zen garden, massive fitness center with high end equipment, indoor basketball court, bike storage, concierge, dog spa with dog park.
🏡 Apartments are masterfully crafted, offering 2 different color schemes, stainless steel appliances, w/d in-unit, custom tile backsplash.
4 weeks free self-prorated factored into listed price!
Text for more info or a tour and we'll get you set!
My service is 100% FREE for you!
*Pricing and lease terms subject to change by the property.
Pictures are taken from the property but may not be exact unit.
I can get you all the detailed info over to you.*
